name: UBX-TIM-VRFY
description: This message contains verification information about previous time received via assistance data or from RTC.

fields.name: itow
fields.description: integer millisecond tow received by source

fields.name: deltaMs
fields.description: integer milliseconds of delta time (current time minus sourced time)

fields.name: flags
fields.description: Flags. Aiding time source: bits 2...0 U:3 src (0 = no time aiding done, 2 = source was RTC, 3 = source was assistance data)
